title: Spalding NBA 54" Glass U-Turn In-Ground Hoop System

description.detailed:
Players of all levels can enjoy the game of basketball with the Spalding NBA 54" Glass U-Turn In-Ground Hoop System.
Spalding NBA 54" Glass U-Turn In-Ground Hoop System:
  • Board size: 54" x 32"
  • Tempered glass board; 2' offset
  • Steel board frame with aluminum trim
  • Pro Image breakaway rim
  • U-Turn lift; detachable handle
  • 4" square steel pole
  • Spalding hoop system designed for outdoor residential play
description.short:
• Board size: 54" x 32"
  • Tempered glass board; 2' offset
  • U-Turn lift; Detachable handle
description.medium: The Spalding 88454G In-Ground Basketball System will transform your backyard into a basketball court. This system features a tempered glass backboard with heavy-duty steel frame to offer long lasting performance. The four-inch Square Steel PolePro Image Breakaway Rim effectively reduces the shattering of backboard and risk of hand injury. The board offset u-turn lift system allows you to adjust the rim from 7 to 10 feet in gradual increments. The ground sleeve that comes with this 54-inch glass basketball system makes for easy installation and removal of the item. Play every shot with confidence with this basketball backboard system. Made by Spalding, this is sports equipment you can trust.

category.categoryPath: Home Page/Sports & Outdoors/Sports/Basketball/In Ground Basketball Hoops

title: Lifetime Adjustable In-Ground Basketball Hoop (54-Inch Tempered Glass), 90568

description.detailed:
Lifetime Adjustable In-Ground Basketball Hoop (54-Inch Tempered Glass), Features:
  • This system has a 4" hard square pole that bolts down and comes with a two 2-piece pole
  • Crank adjust
  • 6 mm tempered glass backboard
  • Slam-it ultra rim
  • Max backboard offset of 2.5'
  • This system comes with corner guards and is packaged in 1 box
  • 5-year limited warranty
description.short: The Lifetime Crank-Adjust Bolt-Down basketball system features a 54" Tempered Glass backboard with fade-resistant graphics and a powder-coated steel frame, giving you the performance and look of a pro-style game. The Crank Adjust height adjustment mechanism easily adjusts from 7.5 to 10 feet high in infinite height increments. The system also features a heavy-duty Slam-It Ultra? Rim with a wrap-around steel brace, and includes a heavy-duty nylon net. It has a 4" square, bolt-down, powder-coated steel pole, and a 28.5" offset from pole to backboard. So bring the arena home with a basketball system from Lifetime Products.

category.categoryPath: Home Page/Sports & Outdoors/Sports/Basketball/In Ground Basketball Hoops

title: Lifetime 54" Shatterproof In-Ground Infinate Height Adjustable Basketball System, 78888

description.detailed:
Lifetime 54" Shatterproof In-Ground Infinate Height Adjustable Basketball System, 78888:
  • In-ground basketball system includes a 54" acrylic backboard and a Slam-It Pro Rim with spring-back action
  • Adjust the height of the backboard on this Lifetime basketball hoop with just a squeeze of the handle
  • Made with top-quality construction and an innovative design
  • Features UV-protection and powder-coated steel for long-lasting use
  • Has weather resistance to discoloration and rusting
description.short: Lifetime's in-ground basketball hoops are the perfect option for beginning and seasoned players alike! The rim adjusts with one hand from 7.5-10 ft to a height you're comfortable with. The backboard combines a steel frame with a polycarbonate playing surface, making it durable and weather resistant. From pick-up games to shooting competitions, this hoop will be a hit with everyone who plays.
description.medium: The Lifetime 54" Shatter Proof In-Ground System will let you perfect your game at home. You and your friends and family can play any time, all the time. This in-ground basketball system includes a 54" acrylic backboard and a Slam-It Pro Rim with spring-back action. Its Lifetime Power Lift feature allows you to easily adjust the height of the backboard with just a squeeze of the handle, setting the stage for exciting dunk contests involving players of various heights. It is made with top quality construction and an innovative design to help you get the most out of your game and your investment. This Lifetime basketball hoop also features weather resistance to discoloration and rusting, as well as UV-protection and powder-coated steel. The result is a basketball hoop the will look nice and hold up over many games and years.

title: Silverback SBX 54" In-Ground Basketball Hoop with Adjustable-Height Backboard and QuickPlay Design

description.detailed:
• ULTIMATE STRENGTH – In-ground basketball hoop directly installs into ground and secured by concrete inside pole
  • INCREASED STABILITY – Revolutionary installation design with Stabili-Strength Technology
  • CONTINUOUS MATERIAL BACKBOARD – 54" W x 33" H Infinity Edge backboard that folds backward for increased rigidity
  • HEIGHT-ADJUSTABLE DESIGN – Powder-coated steel pole heights adjusts from 7.5' to 10' with all-steel actuator
  • ULTRA-FAST ASSEMBLY ¬– Quick-Play design and preassembled parts makes assembly as quick and easy as possible
description.short:
• In-ground basketball hoop
  • Adjustable-height backboard
  • Ultra-fast assembly
  • 5-year limited warranty

category.categoryPath: Home Page/Sports & Outdoors/Sports/Basketball/In Ground Basketball Hoops

title: Lifetime Adjustable In-Ground Basketball Hoop (54-Inch Polycarbonate), 90962

description.detailed:
• 3-Piece Powder-Coated Steel Round Pole
  • 5-Year Limited Warranty
  • All-Weather Net
  • Fade-Resistant Graphics
  • Power Lift® Adjustment
  • Slam-It Pro® Rim
  • Steel-Framed Shatterproof Backboard
description.short:
• Adjustment Mechanism: The patented Power Lift® offers instant and effortless height adjustment from 7.5 to 10 feet in infinite increments! Adjusts in seconds with just one hand, allowing players of any age or skill to enjoy the game at their level.
  • Backboard: The Shatterproof polycarbonate playing surface gives you the look and play of pro-style glass. Graphics are screen-printed with UV-protected inks for superior color and protection against the elements.
  • Frame: Lifetime's pro-styled steel frame gives you the look, the feel and the power of the professional game! The frame is powder-coated with a rust-resistant finish to withstand the harshest elements.
  • Pole: Our round steel poles feature a patented friction-weld joint that safeguards against unwanted movement. All Lifetime steel poles are protected with a powder-coated, weather-resistant finish.
  • Rim: The Slam-It Pro® Rim is built for aggressive play with an arena-style wraparound brace, supporting a 5/8-inch ring of solid steel. The double-compression springs let you slam it like a pro!

title: Spalding 88830G 60" Performance Glass In-Ground Basketball System

description.short: <LI>60" glass backboard reinforced with a solid steel H-frame<LI>Flex breakaway rim flexes and snaps back into position
description.medium: The Spalding In-Ground Basketball System, 88830G can be a fun addition to your backyard so that you and your children can enjoy playing the popular sport. The in-ground basketball system features a 60" glass backboard that is reinforced with a steel H-frame. The rim used in this system has a flex breakaway feature so that it flexes and snaps back easily. One can also adjust the height of this basketball system easily. It also comes with a U-Turn pro lift system with removable crank so that you can set the height from 7' to 10'. The sturdy adjustable basketball system comes with a pole pad in order to make things safer while playing a game. The durable and high-quality basketball system does not include a basketball. The Spalding basketball system has been designed to last for years to come and give you plenty of opportunity to improve your game.

title: Spalding NBA 60" Glass Arena View H Series In-Ground Hoop System

description.detailed:
• Spalding NBA 60" Glass Arena View H Series In-Ground Adjustable Basketball Hoop System
  • Backboard size: 60" x 38"
  • Tempered glass board; 3' offset
  • Steel board frame with aluminum trim
  • Positive Lock breakaway rim
  • 7' to 10' height adjustment; U-Turn Pro lift; Detachable handle
  • 6" square steel pole with heavy-duty padding
  • Adjustable Basketball Hoop system designed for outdoor residential play
description.short:
• Board size: 60" x 38"
  • Tempered glass board; 3' offset
  • Adjustable Basketball Hoop system, adjusts from 7' to 10' feet in height; U-Turn Pro lift; Detachable handle
description.medium: The Spalding 86604HGP Arena View 60" Glass In-Ground Basketball System can be installed in your backyard or on your driveway for hours of basketball fun. This system will have young and old alike living a more active lifestyle. This unique Spalding basketball system has a 60" glass backboard that is reinforced with a solid steel H-frame for added strength. This makes it appropriate for even very tall adults. The height of the rim is easily adjustable with the U-turn height adjustment crank, allowing you to customize the basketball backboard system for young or old players. You can adjust the height anywhere from 7' to 10'. This height-adjustment basketball device comes with a 6" square pole and a pole pad that helps to protect players for added safety. Have fun for years to come and get your daily exercise with this basketball backboard system.
